resources.string: Select a market data provider to use. You will have to obtain an API key from whichever you select. IEX Cloud and World Trading Data both have free services.
Tap to set. Note: free keys are very limited and can only fetch 5 quotes per minute
Tap to set. Note: subscription is required.
Tap to set. Note: free keys are limited to 250 queries per day.
Tap to test the configuration for the selected provider.
